sentences.en: Astanga Yoga is a therapeutic physical exercise that focuses on breathing and relaxation.
sentences.cn: 八步功法瑜伽注重呼吸和放松，是一种舒缓身心的锻炼方法。

sentences.en: Interactions that are classified as adverse either compromise therapeutic efficacy, enhance toxicity, or both.
sentences.cn: 不利的相互作用是指两药合并应用后会降低疗效, 增强毒性, 或二者兼有.

sentences.en: Many therapeutic agents have been implicated in allergies in many species of animals.
sentences.cn: 许多动物过敏反应涉及很多治疗剂.

sentences.en: Objective : To observe exercise therapeutic efficacy in patients with primary discovery hypertension.
sentences.cn: 目的: 观察高血压病运动康复治疗的疗效.

sentences.en: Objective : To observe the clinical therapeutic effect of zengshengping in intestinal metaplasia ( IM ) .
sentences.cn: 目的观察增生平片治疗肠上 皮化生 的临床疗效.

sentences.en: Objective : To observe the therapeutic effect of Shenfu Injection on vascular dementia.
sentences.cn: 目的观察参附注射液治疗血管性痴呆的疗效.

sentences.en: Objective Researching the therapeutic function of low - temperature ice bed to ACVD.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨低温冰床对急性脑血管病(ACVD)的治疗作用.

sentences.en: Of great therapeutic importance is the solubility of the various penicillins.
sentences.cn: 具有重要治疗意义的是各种青霉素的溶解度.

sentences.en: Some claim that the herb has therapeutic value for treating pain.
sentences.cn: 有些人称这种草药具有止痛的疗效。

sentences.en: Therapeutic measures were selected to fit the patient.
sentences.cn: 选择治疗措施以适应病人的需要.

sentences.en: There are different kinds of therapeutic principles in TCM.
sentences.cn: 中医有各种不同的治疗原则.

sentences.en: Therefore, the operation has a dual effect, therapeutic and prophylactic.
sentences.cn: 由此, 整个腹股沟管再不会受到将来退变性或机械性的影响而被全面地, 永久性地保护起来.

sentences.en: This positive interaction is therapeutic , and much less expensive than visits to a psychologist.
sentences.cn: 这种积极的双向行为,犹如—一剂良药, 还比求助于心理学家划算得多.

sentences.en: This precludes placing therapeutic levels of drugs in the feed as a method of treatment.
sentences.cn: 这妨碍在饲料中按治疗法放入治疗量药物.

sentences.en: When I was sad, music had a therapeutic effect.
sentences.cn: 我悲伤的时候, 音乐有治疗效力.

words.tran_cn: 治疗的；治疗学的；有益于健康的

trans.tran_cn: 治疗（学）的，疗法的，有益于健康的
trans.tran_en: relating to the treatment or cure of an illness
